sentences.sentence: There was all the usual humbug and obligatory compliments from ministers.
sentences.translation: 全都是些部长们常说的谎言和奉承恭维。

sentences.sentence: I thought you must be a humbug all along, from the conceited way you talked.
sentences.translation: 从你说话的自大神气来看，我一直觉得你是个骗子。

sentences.sentence: This is all humbug and good humor, of course.
sentences.translation: 这些当然只是人们的幽默和子虚乌有。
